languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}, Ваша Светлость. Даже не знаю, с чего начать..." {n}Губернатор устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "Иномирные твари — не редкость в Просторе Коронус, и не первое десятилетие доставляют неприятности мирам, расположенным по эту сторону Зева. Но сейчас... сейчас мрази словно сорвались с цепи. Они без всякой боязни нападают на корабли, либо повреждая суда и делая их непригодными для перевозок, либо полностью потроша их!"

traits.locale_text: "Ксеносы, ваша светлость. Даже не знаю, с чего начать..." {n}Губернатор устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "Иномирные твари — не редкость в Просторе Коронус, и не первое десятилетие доставляют неприятности мирам, расположенным по эту сторону зева. Но сейчас... сейчас мрази словно сорвались с цепи. Они без всякой боязни нападают на корабли, либо повреждая суда и делая их непригодными для перевозок, либо полностью потроша их!"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}, Ваша Светлость. Даже не знаю, с чего начать..." {n}Губернатор устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "Иномирные твари — не редкость в Просторе Коронус, и не первое десятилетие доставляют неприятности мирам, расположенным по эту сторону Зева. Но сейчас... сейчас мрази словно сорвались с цепи. Они без всякой боязни нападают на корабли, либо повреждая суда и делая их непригодными для перевозок, либо полностью потроша их!"

I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on a rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

languages.text: “还有{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，大人，这件事情我简直不知道该从何说起……”{n}他疲惫地揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“来自异界的野兽在科罗努斯扩区并不少见。几十年来，它们一直在威胁着巨口这边的世界。可现在……现在这群畜生简直是横行无忌。它们袭击舰船的时候，已经一点都不怕了。它们要么把这些船拆得七零八落，根本无法继续进行运输工作，要么直接把它们开膛破肚！”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: “还有{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，大人，这件事情我简直不知道该从何说起……”{n}他疲惫地揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“来自异界的野兽在科罗努斯扩区并不少见。几十年来，它们一直在威胁着巨口这边的世界。可现在……现在这群畜生简直是横行无忌。它们袭击舰船的时候，已经一点都不怕了。它们要么把这些船拆得七零八落，根本无法继续进行运输工作，要么直接把它们开膛破肚！”

languages.text: «{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No sabría por dónde empezar...». {n}Se frota el puente de la nariz, cansado.{/n} «Las bestias de otros mundos son comunes en la Extensión de Koronus, llevan siendo una amenaza para todos los mundos a este lado de las Fauces desde hace décadas. Pero ahora... esas aberraciones están descontroladas. Atacan naves sin miedo, infligiendo tantos daños como para inutilizarlas ¡o destruyéndolas por completo!».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: «{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No sabría por dónde empezar...» {n}Se frota el puente de la nariz, cansado.{/n} «Las bestias de otros mundos son comunes en la Extensión de Koronus, llevan siendo una amenaza para todos los mundos a este lado de las Fauces desde hace décadas. Pero ahora... esas aberraciones están descontroladas. Atacan naves sin miedo, infligiendo tantos daños como para inutilizarlas ¡o destruyéndolas por completo!».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}です、陛下。どこから話をはじめればいいのやら…」{n}彼は疲労混じりに鼻柱をさする。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいて、異世界の怪物は珍しくはありません。もう何十年もの間、マウのこちら側の惑星に脅威を与えてきた存在です。しかし、今の奴らは…手に負えない状態です。奴らは恐れることなく船を襲い、輸送に適さなくなるまで損傷させるか、完全に破壊してしまうのです！」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}です、陛下。どこから話をはじめればいいのやら…」{n}彼は疲労混じりに鼻柱をさする。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいて、異世界の怪物は珍しくはありません。もう何十年もの間、マウのこちら側の惑星に脅威を与えてきた存在です。しかし、今の奴らは…手に負えない状態です。奴らは恐れることなく船を襲い、輸送に適さなくなるまで損傷させるか、完全に破壊してしまうのです！」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich weiß gar nicht, wo ich anfangen soll ..." {n}Er reibt sich lustlos über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Außerweltliche Bestien sind in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kein ungewöhnlicher Anblick – sie bedrohen die Welten auf dieser Seite des Schlunds schon seit Jahrzehnten. Aber jetzt ... jetzt sind diese Abscheulichkeiten auf dem Vormarsch. Sie greifen furchtlos Schiffe an und beschädigen sie entweder so stark, dass sie ihre Transportaufgaben nicht mehr erfüllen können, oder sie schlachten sie gleich komplett aus!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich weiß gar nicht, wo ich anfangen soll ..." {n}Er reibt sich lustlos über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Außerweltliche Bestien sind in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kein ungewöhnlicher Anblick – sie bedrohen die Welten auf dieser Seite des Schlunds schon seit Jahrzehnten. Aber jetzt ... jetzt sind diese Abscheulichkeiten auf dem Vormarsch. Sie greifen furchtlos Schiffe an und beschädigen sie entweder so stark, dass sie ihre Transportaufgaben nicht mehr erfüllen können, oder sie schlachten sie gleich komplett aus!"

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, Votre Seigneurie. J'ignore par où commencer... » {n}Il se frotte le nez avec lassitude.{/n} « Ces créatures sillonnent les Étendues de Koronus et représentent une menace pour les mondes de ce côté-ci de la Gueule depuis des décennies. Et pourtant... elles semblent maintenant avoir franchi un cap dans leur sauvagerie. Ces abominations s'en prennent à nos vaisseaux sans la moindre retenue. Les bâtiments qui ne sont pas anéantis sur place et parviennent à rentrer à bon port sont tout simplement bons pour la casse ! »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, Votre Seigneurie. J'ignore par où commencer... » {n}Il se frotte le nez avec lassitude.{/n} « Ces créatures sillonnent les Étendues de Koronus et représentent une menace pour les mondes de ce côté-ci de la Gueule depuis des décennies. Et pourtant... elles semblent maintenant avoir franchi un cap dans leur sauvagerie. Ces abominations s'en prennent à nos vaisseaux sans la moindre retenue. Les bâtiments qui ne sont pas anéantis sur place et parviennent à rentrer à bon port sont tout simplement bons pour la casse ! »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Nereden başlayacağımı gerçekten bilemiyorum." {n}Bitkin bir şekilde burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Dünya dışı yaratıklara Koronus Enginliği'nde nadir rastlanmaz, Ağız'ın bu tarafındaki dünyalara on yıllardır tehlike teşkil ediyorlardı. Ancak bu garabetler artık iyice azıtmaya başladı. En ufak korku ibaresi göstermeden gemilere saldırıyor, nakliyat vazifelerini yerine getiremeyecek hâle gelene kadar onlara hasar veriyor veya direkt olarak paramparça ediyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I don't rightly know where to begin..." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "Otherworldly beasts are not an uncommon sight in the Koronus Expanse — they have been a menace to the worlds this side of the Maw for decades. But now... now those abominations are on the rampage. They show no signs of fear as they attack ships, either damaging them to the point where they become unfit for transport duty or outright gutting them!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Nereden başlayacağımı gerçekten bilemiyorum." {n}Bitkin bir şekilde burnunun köprüsünü ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Dünya dışı yaratıklar Koronus Enginliği'nde nadir görülmezler, Ağız'ın bu tarafındaki dünyalar için on yıllardır tehlike teşkil etmekteler ancak artık bu garabetler azıtmaya başladı. Herhangi bir korku ibaresi göstermeden gemilere saldırıyor, onlara nakliyat vazifelerini yerine getiremeyecek hâle gelene kadar hasar veriyor veya onları direkt olarak paramparça ediyorlar!"
